sentence.Network_en: Revising the procedure was an entirely profitless exercise.
sentence.Network_cn: 对程序进行修改是徒劳无功的.

sentence.Network_en: It is profitless to continue arguing.
Let us have no part in profitless quarrels.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们不要卷入毫无意义的争吵之中.

PerfectNetExp.abs: profiteering 暴利profitless 无益的profligacy 放荡
...profiteer　牟取暴利的人，投机商，奸商profitless　无益的，无利可图的profusion　（１）丰富，大量；（２）挥霍，奢侈.
It is profitless to continue arguing ., 继续争论是无益的.

list.abs: Smoking is absolutely to health harmful and profitless , behoove prohibits in the round ., 吸烟对健康是绝对有害无益的 , 理应全面禁止.
we should regard this , on the evidence so far available , as a singularly profitless enterprise .我们要把这一点，对迄今提供的证据，作为一个单独盈利的企业。
ours has been the first [ expedition ] , and doubtless to be the last , to visit this profitless locality .我们是第一个‘探险队’，无疑也是最后一个造访这个毫无意义的地方。
Revising the procedure an entirely profitless exercise ., 对程序进行修改是徒劳无功的.

sentences.sentence: "let us have no part in profitless quarrels"- D.D.Eisenhower
"How weary, flat, stale, and unprofitable / Seem to me all the uses of this world"- Shakespeare

means.word_mean: 无益的；无用的；无利的，无利可图的

sentences.en: It is profitless to continue arguing.
